p: Larval mortality was observed 96 h later, gelatine capsules were removed, and the diet was observed under a binocular microscope for larvae inside the diet. A larva was considered dead if it did not respond to a gentle touch with a small brush. Missing larvae were considered escaped and subtracted from the number of treated larvae. Seven concentrations of C. acaulis EO (1, 2.5, 6, 7.5, 8, 10, 30 µL/mL) and six concentrations of C. acaulis NE (5, 7.5, 8, 10, 30, 60 µL/mL) were tested, water was used as solvent to prepare the dilutions.
